mapper.update: update sys_dict_kind set status = 0 where id in ( select id from ( select * from sys_dict_kind where `status` = 1 ) sys_dict_kind, ( select @pv := #{id} ) vars where id = #{id} or ( find_in_set(parent_id, @pv) and length(@pv := concat(@pv, ',', id )) ) )
mapper.select: select id, parent_id, dict_name, dict_kind, dict_sort from sys_dict_kind where 1 = 1 and status = 1 order by dict_sort
